P1=0.3*P2+0.5*P3+0.3*0.5*P5
P2=0.3*P1+0.3*0.5*P4
P3=0.7*P1+0.7*0.5*P4
P4=0.7*P2+0.5*P3+0.3*0.5*P5+0.7*0.5*P5+0.5*P6+0.3*0.5*P9
P5=0.3*0.5*P4+0.3*0.5*P7
P6=0.7*0.5*P4+0.7*0.5*P7
P7=0.7*0.5*P5+0.5*P6+0.5*P8+0.3*0.5*P9+0.7*0.5*P9+0.3*0.5*P12
P8=0.7*0.5*P7+0.7*0.5*P10+0.5*P13
P9=0.3*0.5*P7+0.3*0.5*P10
P10=0.5*P8+0.7*0.5*P9+0.5*P11+0.3*0.5*P12+0.7*0.5*P12
P11=0.7*0.5*P10+0.5*P13
P12=0.3*0.5*P10
P13=0.5*P11+0.7*0.5*P12
P1+P2+P3+P4+P5+P6+P7+P8+P9+P10+P11+P12+P13=1
